metadata.title: Profile | Iakhub Seitasanov
metadata.description: Explore the profile of Iakhub Seitasanov, a tech enthusiast with a passion for software development and innovation. Stay updated with his insights and latest projects.
metadata.name: Iakhub Seitasanov

info.heading: Hello! I'm Iakhub, a web developer with passionate inspiration.
info.subtitle:
My projects are not only technically advanced but also infused with creativity. I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, NextJS), Node.js, Fastify, MongoDB. I'm inspired by the desire to create not just code but stories that captivate attention and enhance the user experience.

Ready to bring your idea to life? Let's create something amazing together!
